title: Downfall: Redux (GOG)
description:
Install instructions:
- Run "setup_downfall_redux_2.0.0.2.exe"
- Play
PLEASE REMEMBER TO SEED, MANY OTHERS WANT THIS! :)
If you like this game, support the developers and BUY IT!

Title: DOWNFALL REDUX
Genre: Adventure - Point-and-click - Horror
Languages: Audio and text: English
Features: Single-player
Released: February 14, 2016
Size: 1 GB
Company: Harvester Games / Screen 7
Store page: http://www.gog.com/game/downfall_redux

About:
There is nothing Joe wouldn't do for his wife. But as they 
try to save their marriage with a romantic getaway, things 
go from bad to worse, and from worse... to insanity.

Minimum system requirements:
Windows: XP / Vista / 7 (32-bit or 64-bit) 
Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD CPU 
Memory: 4 GB RAM 
Graphics: NVIDIA or AMD ATI video card with 1GB of RAM 
(Nvidia GeForce GTX 260 or higher/ATI Radeon 4890 or higher) 
DirectX: Version 9.0c 
Storage: 2 GB available space 
Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card 
Additional Notes: Keyboard required
